http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/index.html
will be announcing the winners of the fanfic portion of the contest 
soon...but I would also like to mention that on...
http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/contestinfo.html
The winners of the Fanart part of the contest are...
1st place~Kurot
2nd~Secretary Copy Cat
3rd~ S-girl

the images are all offline now so we can't see Kurot's work but I'm 
sure we all recall S-girl's pic of Hijikata and Ayunee...now if you 
will notice I'm called "Secretary Copy Cat" for my rendition of PMK 
Saitou (which is in the PHOTOS section)...I hope its a *joke* (I did 
email the site owners right away to get an explanation) but I don't 
copy/trace stuff...I just stared at the scanlations of PMK Saitou 
for a long time while I was eating dinner and came up with a pose 
after surfing the net for iaido poses and in my drawing PMK Saitou's 
left arm is completely wrong (his elbow shouldn't be that low---it 
should be "out").  In any case, I'm no artist but I would never 
descend to the level of tracing a manga and say that its my work.  
Lastly, I'm also not getting any of the prizes offered either.

Secretarytocapt3
http://www.shinsengumimb.com
*a bit perplexed---will have to look over pics of Jo Odagiri to feel 
better now*
